      • configureDatasource

        protected void configureDatasource​(LocalContainer container,
                                   String etcDir)
                            throws IOException
        Jetty 12.x requiring different jetty-plus modules for different EE versions, this implementation creates no replacements, but rather adds the c3p0 and other JARs to the container classpath. Configure datasource definitions.
        Overrides:
        configureDatasource in class Jetty8xStandaloneLocalConfiguration
        Parameters:
        container - Container.
        etcDir - The etc directory of the configuration.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the pooling component cannot be copied.
